body_text: The new lint rules in #857 is going to complain that these aren't required and also don't have defaults. I suggest making them required, since the selector always passed them in.
body: The new lint rules in #857 is going to complain that these aren't required and also don't have defaults. I suggest making them required, since the selector always passed them in.
